page.title: Cartman's Mom is a Dirty Slut

section.p: The boys are concerned when Cartman doesn't show up to school, and go to his house only to find him having tea in his back yard with his stuffed animals. They go to Mr. Mackey, who instructs them to videotape Cartman's behavior for further study. It turns out that Cartman is in distress because he has come to realize he is the only one among his friends without a father. He asks his mother who his father is, but Liane Cartman vaguely remembers the night during which Eric was conceived.

Liane recalls that at the 12th Annual Drunken Barn Dance, she got really hammered before running into Chief Running Water, and assumed that he was the man who impregnated her. Cartman goes to the Chief who recalls that Liane went for Chef instead, and Chef then tells Cartman that Liane then went for Mr. Garrison. Cartman goes to the pub to confront Mr. Garrison, who admits to having sex with Liane that night, along with the rest of the patrons at the bar (including the women). The situation looks hopeless until Dr. Mephisto tells Eric he can do a DNA test to find the real answer, but it would cost a hefty $3,000.

Meanwhile, the other boys decide to enter their video of Cartman having tea with his dolls in the America's Stupidest Home Videos competition after hearing about its $10,000 grand prize. They promise to give Cartman the money he needs for the DNA test, just before he watches the video broadcast all over America on primetime television. The video loses to another entry--a videotape of Kenny getting run over by a train filmed by Stan's grandfather--but the kids still get the $3,000 runner-up prize.
Mephisto performs the DNA test against everyone who was present at the Drunken Barn Dance, and the results are left as a cliffhanger for the next season to resolve.
Kenny is killed by a train after being dragged onto the tracks by Stan's go-kart.
The cliffhanger is intensified by the fact that the resolution is in the second episode of Season 2 , not the first.

line.text: Kid, I hate to break this to you, but your mother is what we Native Americans refer to as 'Bear with wide canyon'.
She is 'Doe who cannot keep legs together'.
